OrgName.entry: LIFELONG LEARNING AND SKILLS SERVICE - COMMUNITY

Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council aiming to map, plan and promote community based adult learning in consultation with local communities; to support, develop and provide adult learning; to monitor adult learning services across the city; to evaluate with learners the quality of teaching and learning available to them. Has 2 area development workers and other project workers covering a number of priority areas in Sheffield. Also co-ordinates and leads for Sheffield City Council's Children and Young People's Service on family learning and community based ICT and skills for life.
